name: sensitive-word-check
description: A comprehensive sensitive word detection system with combined local and Azure Content Moderator capabilities

scripts.build: bun build src/core/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm
scripts.build:web: bun build src/web/index.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --minify
scripts.build:api: bun build src/api/server.ts --outdir dist/api --target node --format esm
scripts.build:sdk: bun build src/sdk/client.ts --outdir dist/sdk --target node --format esm && bun build src/sdk/client.ts --outdir dist/sdk --target browser --format esm --minify --outfile=client.browser.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:web && npm run build:api && npm run build:sdk
scripts.api:test: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/detect -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"text":"测试文本"}'

author: Andy
